description: Adorable Jack Hunter can’t stand his step dad, muscular Tristan Jaxx, and hates his rules even more! Ever since he moved in, the basement has been locked off, and athletic Jack needs to know what he’s hiding down there. He sneaks in one day to discover a sex dungeon, and catches Tristan changing into some leather dom gear, but hunky Tristan corners him before he can get away. Jack confesses that he just wants to be punished by Tristan’s big cock, and that’s exactly what the horny bottom gets!
title: Step Daddy's Basement - Part 1
